I was surprised that 6lb EVA actually performed very well, but when you account for the extra cost and weight, I’m endorsing 3lb crosslinked Polyethylene and 3.8LB EVA. My full test report is on the thrifty product release thread. The Thrifty Bot 2025 - 2026 Product Releases & Updates

The Thrifty Bot 2025 - 2026 Product Releases & Updates
  1. QTY 4 - Thrifty Bumper Foam - 3lb Cross-Linked XPE

We are releasing a white paper documenting bumper foam testing and as part of it we are releasing our own bumper foam.

Key Findings:

  • 70%+ reduction in permanent deformation compared to pool noodles
  • Lower average deceleration forces than pool noodles
